<xsl:param name="_TIF_MESSAGE_"></xsl:param> <!--The list of Extensions defined by user--> <xsl:template name="myFunction"> <xsl:param name = "splitups"/> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="tag"> <xsl:value-of select="local-name()"></xsl:value-of> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name = "checker1" > <xsl:value-of select ="substring-after($splitups,$tag)"/> </xsl:variable>

</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="settedString"> <xsl:value-of select="java:_getStringProperty($_TIF_MESSAGE_, 'Additional_Fields')"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="AdditionalDataWithLimitter"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$settedString !=null or not(normalize-space($settedString)='')"> <xsl:value-of select="(concat($settedString,$AdditionalData))"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$AdditionalData"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="java:_setStringProperty($_TIF_MESSAGE_, 'Additional_Fields',$AdditionalDataWithLimitter)"/> </xsl:template> <!--The list of parameters defined by user--> <xsl:param name="_TIF_MESSAGE_"></xsl:param> <!--The list of Extensions defined by user--> <lxslt:component prefix="QueryGenerator" functions="isBlank"> <lxslt:script lang="javascript"><![CDATA[function isBlank(str) { return (!str || /^\s*$/.test(str)); }
// JMS-Message can be accessed using 'document' variable function generateQuery(strinput) { var output = "INSERT INTO finastra.truncatedcontent ( uetr, field, keypair, valuepair ) VALUES "; var flagempty = true; var mainpairs = strinput.split('ENDOFUETR'); var UETR = mainpairs[0]; if(mainpairs[1]) { var rest = mainpairs[1]; var truncpairs = rest.split('ENDOFTRUNCATEDFIELD'); var arrayLength = truncpairs.length; for (var i = 0; i < arrayLength; i++) { var trunckeyvalue = truncpairs[i].split('ENDOFFIELDTAG'); if(trunckeyvalue.length > 1 && !isBlank(trunckeyvalue[1])){ if(trunckeyvalue[1]) { var keyvaluepairs = trunckeyvalue[1].split('ENDOFPAIR'); var arrayLength1 = keyvaluepairs.length; for (var j = 0; j < arrayLength1; j++) { var keyvaluepair = keyvaluepairs[j].split('CONCATPAIR'); if(keyvaluepair[1]){ output = output.concat("('" , UETR , "','" , trunckeyvalue[0] , "','" , keyvaluepair[0] , "','" , keyvaluepair[1] , "'),"); flagempty = false; }
} } } } } if(flagempty) { output = ""; }else { output = output.replace(/.$/,";"); } return output; }
function generateReadableData(strinput) { var output = "MessageID : "; var flagempty = true; var mainpairs = strinput.split('ENDOFUETR'); var UETR = mainpairs[0]; output = output.concat(UETR, "\nList of Truncated content:\n"); if(mainpairs[1]) { var rest = mainpairs[1]; var truncpairs = rest.split('ENDOFTRUNCATEDFIELD'); var arrayLength = truncpairs.length; for (var i = 0; i < arrayLength; i++) { var trunckeyvalue = truncpairs[i].split('ENDOFFIELDTAG'); if(trunckeyvalue.length > 1 && !isBlank(trunckeyvalue[1])){ output = output.concat("\n"+trunckeyvalue[0]+"\n"); if(trunckeyvalue[1]) { var keyvaluepairs = trunckeyvalue[1].split('ENDOFPAIR'); var arrayLength1 = keyvaluepairs.length; for (var j = 0; j < arrayLength1; j++) { var keyvaluepair = keyvaluepairs[j].split('CONCATPAIR'); if(keyvaluepair[1]){ output = output.concat("Value in MT message : ", keyvaluepair[0], "+", "\nValue in MX message : ", keyvaluepair[0], keyvaluepair[1] , "\n"); flagempty = false; }
} } } } } if(flagempty) { output = ""; }else { output = output.replace(/.$/,";"); } return output; }]]></lxslt:script> </lxslt:component> </xsl:stylesheet>
